ancient_artifacts.name: The Amulet of Aethel
ancient_artifacts.description: A shimmering amulet said to deflect minor curses and enhance the wearer's magical resistance. Forged in the heart of a dying star.

ancient_artifacts.name: The Orb of Whispers
ancient_artifacts.description: A crystal orb that allows the user to hear faint echoes of past conversations. Its visions are often fragmented but reveal crucial clues.

ancient_artifacts.name: The Ever-Burning Lamp
ancient_artifacts.description: A simple, yet invaluable lamp that produces light without fuel, forever. Perfect for dark dungeons or late-night studies.

potent_spells.name: Ignis Bolt
potent_spells.effect: Hurls a bolt of concentrated fire at a single target.

potent_spells.name: Healing Aura
potent_spells.effect: Radiates a soothing aura, restoring health to nearby allies.

mythical_creatures.name: Forest Sprite
mythical_creatures.description: Small, ethereal beings known for their ability to charm animals and lead travelers astray with illusions.

mythical_creatures.name: Stone Golem
mythical_creatures.description: Massive constructs of living rock, often guarding ancient treasures or forgotten passages.
